name: Round Riot
description:
Round Riot was my first attempt at a big project with Unity3D. It's a survivor shooter with online coop, and it turned out pretty good! Except for the fact that all assets are just the default shapes offered in Unity... but other than that it's smooth and pretty fun!

Visit andrewdaly.ca for more info :) 

And please don't give me money for this, it's awful lol.
